Text: Doesn't show on three avi-players. Doesn't convert either on three different converters. Won't be recognized, can anyone help?
Impossible to open, despite programs/dvdplayers. Don't download this, it's just a bad file - impossible to open and/or watch. Look elsewhere for the movie. Disappointing, but shit happens.
Well, I apologize - it works perfect with xvid (of course) and plays beautifully. Sorry for being an arse, trixtah. The Windows mediaplayer fucked it up.

No worries, screenslave.

Robster65, it does seem to be a slightly unusual encoding - I don't recall where I got it - but it opens fine in VLC on both Windows and Linux. You can get VLC here: http://www.videolan.org/vlc/
